comments:
1. start EPF M4-N20060712 and load a 7.0.1 library
2. create a new capability pattern CP1 with a configuration config1
3. use deep copy to copy an existing capability
4. delete the capability patern CP1
results=> BasicIndexOutOfBoundsException in the log

When an activity is being unload, it tried to unreference itself from other object, including its successor by clearing linkToPredecessor list. However this caused the WorkOrder object to be removed from the activity package by notification handler in item provider. Clearing all activity adapters before doing this fixed this problem.
